space.arim.universal.events.helper

Class AbstractCancellable

  • java.lang.Object
    • space.arim.universal.events.helper.AbstractEvent
      • space.arim.universal.events.helper.AbstractCancellable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cancellable, Event
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AutoFiringCancellable

    public abstract class AbstractCancellable
extends AbstractEvent
implements Cancellable
    A helper class for implementing Event and Cancellable, ensuring the specifications of both are always complied with.
    Author:
    A248

    • Method Detail

      • isCancelled

        public boolean isCancelled()
        Description copied from interface: Cancellable
        Whether the event has been cancelled, presumably by another listener.

        Implementations MUST be thread safe! Use a volatile variable.
        Specified by:
        isCancelled in interface Cancellable
        Returns:
        true if the event is cancelled, false otherwise

      • setCancelled

        public void setCancelled(boolean cancelled)
        Description copied from interface: Cancellable
        Cancels (or uncancels) the event.

        Implementations MUST be thread safe! Use a volatile variable.
        Specified by:
        setCancelled in interface Cancellable
        Parameters:
        cancelled - whether or not to cancel
